analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern executive actions and orders related to governance, military administration, and appointments during times of war or significant national events. They cover topics such as military command structures, observance of religious practices in the military, establishment of provisional courts, designation of locations for stock subscriptions, governance of newly acquired territories, infrastructure projects, legal proceedings against rebels, army reorganization, land allocation for freedmen, and administration of military governments in occupied territories.
title: Executive Actions on Military, Governance, and Infrastructure
